org.osmdroid.api

Interface IMap

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GoogleV1MapWrapper, MapWrapper, OsmdroidMapWrapper

    public interface IMap
    An interface that contains the common features of osmdroid and Google Maps v2. It's not used directly by this library can be proguarded out if not needed

      • getBearing

        float getBearing()
        Get the bearing of the map. Zero means the top of the map is facing north.

      • setBearing

        void setBearing(float bearing)
        Set the bearing of the map. Set to zero for the top of the map to face north.

      • addPolyline

        int addPolyline(Polyline polyline)
        Add a polyline. This polyline will be added below other polylines, markers and MyLocationOverlay.
        Returns:
        an id that can be used for adding points with addPointsToPolyline(int, org.osmdroid.api.IGeoPoint...)

      • addPointsToPolyline

        void addPointsToPolyline(int id,
                       org.osmdroid.api.IGeoPoint... points)
        Add points to a polyline
        Parameters:
        id - the id returned from addPolyline(Polyline)
        points - the points to add
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if a polyline with this id was not added

      • clearPolyline

        void clearPolyline(int id)
        Removes one polyline.
        Parameters:
        id - the id returned from addPolyline(Polyline)
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if a polyline with this id was not added

      • clear

        void clear()
        Removes all markers, polylines, polygons, overlays, etc from the map.

        Sets a callback that's invoked when the map view changes position.
